text: Watch out! For I am against you, declares the Lord Almighty. I will set fire to your chariots and they will go up in smoke. Your strong young men2:13. Literally, “young lions.” will be killed by the sword. I will stop you plundering other peoples.2:13. Literally, “cut off your prey from the earth.” The demands of your ambassadors2:13. Emissaries: the Assyrians sent their representatives to other nations to demand submission and tribute. will no longer be heard.
